revised_title: Neutron Diffraction Study of Titanium-Niobium Oxides Structures
tldr: This article presents a powder neutron diffraction study of two mixed metal oxides of niobium, examining their structures and cation ordering. The authors used profile analysis to refine the atomic positions, thermal parameters, and occupancy of the titanium-niobium oxides, providing a more precise understanding of the distortions around crystallographic shear planes. The study contributes to the knowledge of complex materials and their properties.
